title: Chromatic Calculator
description: Chromatic Orb cost calculator for re-roll the color of sockets on a weapon or piece of armour.
short_desc: Chromatic Orb cost calculator for socket color rerolls

title: Path of Regex
description: A tool for generating vendor search strings. With no false positives matches and with query shortening, so you can fit more stuff in to your search!
short_desc: Creates search strings with accurate matches and shortened queries for efficient searches

title: FilterBlade
description: FilterBlade is a tool for customizing item filters in Path of Exile. It offers ready-made filters like Neversink's and allows users to add personal touches, including custom sounds.
short_desc: Customize your PoE item filter with pre-made options

title: Awakened PoE Trade
description: Awakened Poe Trade is one of the most useful tools you could possibly use, it allows you to easily price check items in-game with the push of a buttons.
short_desc: Price-check items in-game with a simple button press

title: Offical PoE Trade
description: This website allows you to search through items listed for sale in Shop Forums and those listed using Public Premium Stash Tabs in-game.
short_desc: Search and trade items in Shop Forums and Public Premium Stash Tabs in-game

title: Div Cards But Better
description: A tool that helps you determine which divination cards can drop on a selected map or identify the maps where a desired divination card can be obtained.
short_desc: Identify drops on a chosen map or find maps for specific cards

title: Craft of Exile
description: Craft of Exile simplifies crafting in Path of Exile, offering a user-friendly online tool for efficient and cost-effective crafting without the need for installations or downloads. Access everything directly in your browser.
short_desc: Browser-based tool for simplified, cost-effective crafting in PoE

title: Path of Buidling
description: Path of Building is an open-source build planner for Path of Exile that lets you plan out your skill tree, gems and items. You can start a fresh build or import a Pastebin link from an existing build.
short_desc: PoE build planner for skill, gem, and item planning, supporting fresh starts or Pastebin imports

title: Maxroll.gg
description: Comprehensive knowledge base for Path of Exile, featuring build guides, crafting tutorials, and more.
short_desc: Your go-to hub for PoE build guides, crafting tips, and more

title: POBb.in
description: Share your Path of Building builds online
short_desc: Share your Path of Building builds online

title: PoeStack
description: Use PoeStack to organize and value your items effortlessly, discovering value in your stash with pricing data
short_desc: Use PoeStack to organize and value your items effortlessly, discovering value in your stash with pricing data
